name: A Deadly Dive
description:
A game made in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 48

A Deadly Dive

You've been hired by the government to dive into an alien ship that crashed into the ocean 2 weeks ago. Several teams of divers have already been sent in, with none having returned...

Controls

A, D for movement

Space or W to swim up

Left click to shoot

Music from zapsplatt.com
